title: Jalebi Rocks
overview: Jalebi Rocks is a heartfelt and inspiring film about Vidya Pathak, a 48-year-old housewife. It's a family film that creates a satisfying and unforgettable experience for every family member. Jalebi Rocks celebrates resilience, self-worth, and the indomitable spirit of a woman who refuses to be defined by her age or circumstances. It is a story of achievement, proving that it is never too late to pursue one's dreams and create a fulfilling, meaningful life.
